WRITING.TITLE: Need feedback on my first Tribute(incomplete)
moving to NWArkansas
WRITING.TEXT: I'm planning to move to NW Arkansas later this year but i haven't figured exactly where yet. What Im looking for is good economy, decent house/rent pricing, and a decent population(I live in fort worth, tx and I'm not looking to move to tiny town). I'm Also planning to finish some education at a local community college once i move. Bentonville,fayetteville,Springdale,etc?

WRITING.TITLE: Thinking about moving here
WRITING.TEXT: I currently live in fort worth, Texas. its a great place for a college student but I love the scenery and I've heard good things about Fayetteville and the colleges. My career aim is tech/web development. both me and my roomie are considering moving. from what I've seen the area is more affordable then Fort worth. what is the economy like? are there tech jobs?
Thanks! ill look into it! what is the course called?

WRITING.TITLE: Should I take a web dev. program at my school?
WRITING.TEXT: My local university UTA offers web dev. tracks that end with a certification of completion. Ive been using freecodecamp and other resources online to learn, but It would be great to have in class lessons with a real teacher. only problem is i can barely afford it(financial aid doesn't cover it).is it worth spending 3 to 4 thousand on a program? Taking classes would also calm my family who are just waiting for me to do something like this, but can't financial back me up either. Link to program info:https://web-ded.uta.edu/wconnect/ShowSchedule.awp? Mode=GROUP Group=CERWDV Title=Web+Development+Certificate SubGroup=CER
